title: ‘They bombed every second’: evacuees’ horror weeks in Azovstal steel plant
content:
1. ‘They bombed every second’: evacuees’ horror weeks in Azovstal steel plant  The Guardian
  2. Ukrainian fighters say Russian forces have begun storming a steel plant in Mariupol  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  3. What Happened on Day 69 of the War in Ukraine  The New York Times
